HTML.description: Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.
HTML.usage: Used to structure the content of a web page, define its layout, and add various media elements.
HTML.example:
Hello, World!

This is my web page.

CSS.description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a stylesheet language used to control the presentation of web pages.
CSS.usage: Used to style the layout, fonts, colors, and other visual aspects of a web page.

JavaScript.description: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language primarily used for web development.
JavaScript.usage: Used to add interactivity, dynamic content, and behavior to web pages.
